version_description:
Required iOS version has been raised to iOS 8 and later from this version.
Improved some movies' quality.
Fixed a bug that some looped BGM aren't looped correctly.
Other minor bug fix.

Fixed an issue which could cause a crash on iOS 10.
The copyright notation was changed.
*The defect by which a movie isn't indicated in iOS 11.3 was corrected.

*The defect by which a movie isn't indicated in iOS 11.3 was corrected.
*The copyright notation was changed.

-Required iOS version has been raised to iOS 12 and later from this version.
-Fixed a bug that in-game menus etc. are not displayed correctly on some terminals.
-Fixed a bug that iCloud cannot be restored.
-Changed the handling of links. (Display
- Fixed a bug that phone triggers were not displayed properly in dark mode.
